text: Irganox 1098 is the trade name for N,N'-1,6-hexanediylbis[3,5-bis(1,1-dimethylethyl)-4-hydroxyphenylpropanamide], a primary antioxidant manufactured by BASF primarily used for stabilizing polymers, especially polyamides. It is noted for its thermal stability as well as its non-discoloring properties. ==See also== *Pentaerythritol tetrakis(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxyhydrocinnamate) ==References== Category:Phenol antioxidants
title: Irganox 1098
